cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 305 miles SSW of the mouth of the Mississippi River
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the central Gulf of Mexico and expected to turn north toward the Louisiana coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: West of Cameron, Louisiana to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Cameron, Louisiana to the Mouth of the Pearl River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern Louisiana, southern Mississippi, southern Alabama and the Florida Panhandle
